name: zk-payment-circuits
description: Zero-Knowledge Proof circuits for ZK Payment system

scripts.compile:all: npm run compile:balance && npm run compile:transfer && npm run compile:auth
scripts.setup:balance: snarkjs groth16 setup build/balance_check.r1cs pot12_final.ptau balance_check_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute balance_check_0000.zkey balance_check_final.zkey --name='First' -v
scripts.setup:transfer: snarkjs groth16 setup build/private_transfer.r1cs pot12_final.ptau private_transfer_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute private_transfer_0000.zkey private_transfer_final.zkey --name='First' -v
scripts.setup:auth: snarkjs groth16 setup build/auth_proof.r1cs pot12_final.ptau auth_proof_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute auth_proof_0000.zkey auth_proof_final.zkey --name='First' -v
scripts.export:vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey balance_check_final.zkey ../storage/keys/balance_verification_key.json && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey private_transfer_final.zkey ../storage/keys/transfer_verification_key.json && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey auth_proof_final.zkey ../storage/keys/auth_verification_key.json
scripts.export:solidity: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier balance_check_final.zkey ../contracts/BalanceCheckVerifier.sol && snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier private_transfer_final.zkey ../contracts/PrivateTransferVerifier.sol && snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier auth_proof_final.zkey ../contracts/AuthProofVerifier.sol
